races.name: Women Elite Individual Time Trial | 2025 UCI Road World Championships
races.description: Women's elite individual time trial from BK Arena to Kigali Convention Centre (31.2km, 460m elevation)

races.name: Men Elite Individual Time Trial | 2025 UCI Road World Championships
races.description: Men's elite individual time trial from BK Arena to Kigali Convention Centre (40.6km, 680m elevation)

races.name: Women Elite Road Race | 2025 UCI Road World Championships
races.description: Women's elite road race featuring 11 laps of the challenging Kigali circuit (164.6km, 3,350m elevation)

races.name: Men Elite Road Race | 2025 UCI Road World Championships
races.description: Men's elite road race featuring complex circuit route with 9 laps + extension + 6 laps (267.5km, 5,475m elevation)

races.name: Il Lombardia 2025
races.description: The Monument of the Leaves - final Monument classic of the cycling season featuring climbing through the Italian Lake District

races.name: Tour of Guangxi 2025
races.description: Final UCI WorldTour stage race of the season through the scenic mountains of Guangxi Province, China (6 stages)
